articles.title: New bipedal dinosaur species unearthed in major Zimbabwe discovery - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: Scientists discovered new dinosaur species, in Zimbabwe. The herbivorous dinosaur's remains date back to the late Triassic Period, highlighting Africa's paleontological potential
articles.content:
International scientists discovered the fossilized remains of a previously unknown species of dinosaur in Zimbabwe, Phys.org reported on Thursday.
